text: I went to the store to buy something, the staff just pressed the phone and only knew about the phone, didn't see the customer coming in and didn't greet them, just focused on pressing the phone, very bad.

I would like to create awareness on human behaviour here.

When I walked in as a customer, the shop assistant/ owner treats me nicely and politely. However, when I walked in asking if I can get some recycled boxes. She ignored me somewhat, and told me she can not put aside for me to collect even within 1-2days. She would rather throw them away.

I would really hope the shop assistant/ owner is more aware of ESG and the act of kindness.
Splendid place with friendly staff and low low prices. Definitely a must visit if you are nearby!

Truly a hidden gem in balestier!
